div.p:
I beg leave to
forward to you
Mr Baines' formal
application for
a sum to be
paid statedly to
his mother, and
feel sure that
you will do kindly
do what you
can to forward
his laudable
desire.

The complaint
of Mr Welsh about
the chronometer
having run down
was frivolous.
I wrote a sharp
letter to Mr Charles
Livingstone on
recievingreceiving the report
and on further
investigation felt
ashamed that I had done it. The watch
did not run
down but stopped
and evoked the ejaculation
"Hallo! have I
forgot to wind
it up" on trial
with the key
it was found
wound up. Captn
Haig asked if it
had been neglected
and recievedreceived the
reply No. Mr
Welsh overhearing
this infers & the
inference is gravely
reported to you
as a fact. I was very much
annoyed by the
idea that my
brother was
careless in the
performance of
his duty. He
walked all the
way from
Highbury to this
about midnight
and back again
after recievingreceiving
my note and
after spending
a sleepless night
(I was out till
(12 1/2) was here
again early this
morning to
explain.

I should
like to know
if our magnetical
observations
will come through
Mr Welsh's
hands - He stated
that Mr C. Livingstone
was ignorant
of logarithms.
Now Mr Welsh
never said a
word to him
about them
and he Mr L. is moreover
(though perhaps a
little rusty from
disuse) thoroughly
educated being
B.A. of his
college. If there
is not a sacred
regard to truth in
those to whom our
observations may come
the zeal of the Expedition
for magnetism will
undoubtedly sink to
zero perhaps below it.
I write you because
as I am to be
introduced to her Majesty tomorrow
besides the dinner
in the evening
I fear I may
not have the
pleasure of
waiting on you
till Monday.
Will you kindly
aid me about
the chronometer?
I have thought
a box one
will be preferable.
A note from
you to the Astronomer
Royal and
if necessary
an order for
one of the tried
ones to be
paid for (Â£30
or a bit more)
by me. The
lady came this
morning and
wished me
to go & buy it
at once .

I send all my
packages to
Liverpool tomorrow
(Saturday) and
will visit my
children for the
last time on Tuesdayt.
